You were born during the height of a great magical plague, to a mother suffering from an eldritch disease, or you suffered an eldritch pox as a child, such that your very soul now carries a blight of pestilence within it.

Class Skill: Heal.

Bonus Spells:

  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.pg7dbmuuaksxhp3v]{Charm Animal} (3rd),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.vxi9c3xwa83xthka]{Summon Swarm} (5th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.ppeb97nxg1rmdpme]{Contagion} (7th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.zonwg3yt8pswj03y]{Repel Vermin} (9th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.jdp0mts5razk0qms]{Insect Plague} (11th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.z8xnkfpufuqapseq]{Eyebite} (13th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.f828mjoo5afszqnk]{Creeping Doom} (15th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.e8zen5nzixnt7bde]{Horrid Wilting} (17th),
  • @Compendium[pf1.spells.51ob5y7phwlhcuzz]{Power Word Kill} (19th).

Bonus Feats:

  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.nNVFVFRBCT4O2ab9]{Brew Potion},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.O0e0UCim27GPKFuW]{Diehard},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.ehqx8txNRGMaNOPt]{Endurance},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.fVRnBIHR4Jq6btvm]{Great Fortitude},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8VZQJOyAXbXghxd7]{Self-Sufficient},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.7zJTztNW7hdaqjKc]{Skill Focus} (Knowledge [nature]),
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.2YuxcUNFMPNBpekG]{Silent Spell},
  • @Compendium[pf1.feats.8snLqsJN4LLL00Nq]{Toughness}.

Bloodline Arcana: Vermin are susceptible to your mind-affecting spells. They are treated as animals for the purposes of determining which mind-affecting spells affect them.
